Commands.desc: Will inject Javascript code into a JPG file, if the file is blank it will create a file with the injected code
Will inject Javascript code into a GIF file, if the file is blank it will create a file with the injected code
Will inject Javascript code into a WEBP file, if the file is blank it will create a file with the injected code
Will grab all metadata of a PNG image, you need to use the flag -i for this `go run main.go -i image/path`
Will use a inline script to inject data into PNG files at a specific offset and image
Will inject an archive file into a image, you will need -i and --filepath to specify the image and zip location
Will grab the GPS data or attempt to trace the GPS data of JPG/JPEG image formats use the -i flag for this
Will attempt to go through a list of byte signitures to find the type of a unknown file
Will attempt to extract and unzip a ZIP/Archive file from a JPG/JPEG image format
Will attempt to grab the nameservers of a given domain
Will attempt to grab the MX records of a given domain
Will attempt to grab all of the IP addresses of a domain name
Will attempt to grab the domain names of a IP address
